label: Statue
title: Anything can be placed near a Statue, boosts Temple by 40.

label: Lumberjack
title: Can be grouped for big Sawmill bonus later.

label: Sawmill
title: Build in a circle around Lumberjacks.

label: Seaweed Field
title: Place between Seaweed Farms, later add a Shaman

label: Seaweed Farm
title: Place before Seaweed Field on a peninsula or small island, rotate to catch as many fields as possible.

label: Gold Vein
title: Only one can appear on the map.

label: Gold Mine
title: Place before Jewelry

label: Jewelry
title: Place the Gold Mine first, then the Jewelry in between the Mine and a group of Mansions.

label: Mill
title: Place one, then stack as many fields. Grouping two Mills is possible for bigger Field scores.

label: Field
title: Group around Mills. Keep your Water Plateau with grass on it for expanding on water.

label: Hop Field
title: Place near Brewery and Resort Oasis, you get about 6-8 Hop per game. Can be built on beach.

label: Brewery
title: Place Hop first, then the Brewery. Reserve some space for one more Brewery late game.

label: Brickyard
title: Group together near Sand Pit, keep away from Mansions and Temple.

label: Sandpit
title: Group these together, for 0-12 points each.

label: Mason
title: These can be grouped, great bonus for the Temple.

label: Shaman
title: Can be placed near Flowers or as starting point for Houses/Mansions.

label: Fisher
title: Great for boosting City Centers. Can be placed on Seaweed Fields.

label: City Center
title: Place as soon as you get them, use as starting point for Houses/Mansions.

label: House
title: Large radius, can give 20+ points!

label: Mansion
title: Start near City Center, Statue, Shaman, Fountain or Jewelry. Group near Temple.

label: Hut
title: Great for filling awkward leftover spaces. Its huge radius allows for 25+ scores late game.

label: Fountain
title: Place in between Mansions or Parks.

label: Park
title: Place near Fountain, Houses, Mansions. Place giant group near Monument and Resort Oasis.

label: Plateau
title: Has space for Market or Temple. Great in combination with Mansions and Walls. Boosted by Seaweed.

label: Tower
title: Huge radius can give 50+ points late game. Great booster for the Balloon.

label: Warehouse
title: Place near production areas, mainly boosts the Market.

label: Circus
title: Place near Houses, keep away from Mansions and Temple.

label: Market
title: Place on (Wall) Plateau near a city.

label: Resort Oasis
title: Place near Hop, Parks and Flowers. Can be a 200+ point bonus late game.

label: Tavern
title: Place in between Brewery and Houses. Can give a nice +50 score, but it's hard to increase much further.

label: Temple
title: Place on (Wall) Plateau near cities, Shamans and a group of Masons.

label: Balloon
title: Place near unique buildings, keep away from Temple.

label: Monument
title: Place near group of Parks for 100-300 points.

label: Wall
title: Only place when finished building Houses, Mansions and Parks in that area! Easy to fit in between houses. Can be place around Plateaus and in water.

label: Wall Plateau
title: Build above cities to get large combos with the Market or Temple, can build on other Wall Plateaus.

label: Water Plateau
title: Extends city areas on coastal regions. The grass variant can be used for Parks, Fields and Hop.

label: Flower
title: Boosts Shaman and Resort Oasis.

label: Tree
title: Boosts Lumberjack, Shaman, Park and Resort Oasis.
